3rem;font-size:1rem;background:var(--primaryColor);color:var(--mainBlack);border:1px solid var(--primaryColor);transition:var(--mainTransition);cursor:pointer}.banner-btn:hover{background:transparent;color:var(--primaryColor)}.products{padding:4rem 0}.section-title .bag-btn{transform:translateX(0)}.product-img{display:block;width:100%;min-height:12rem;transition:var(--mainTransition)}.img-container:hover .product-img{opacity:.5}.product h2{text-transform:capitalize;text-align:center;letter-spacing:var(--mainSpacing);margin-bottom:2rem}.cart-item{display:grid;align-items:center;grid-template-columns:auto 1fr h5{letter-spacing:var(--mainSpacing)}.cart-item h5{margin:.5rem 0}.item-amount{text-align:center}.remove-item{color:grey;cursor:pointer}.fa-chevron-down,.fa-chevron-up{color:var(--primaryColor);cursor:pointer}.cart-footer{margin-top:2rem;letter-spacing:var(--mainSpacing);text-align:center}.cart-footer h3{text-transform:capitalize;margin-bottom:1rem}.social-links{display:flex;justify-content:end;align-items:center}.social-links
